name: Jail Football - Soccer Maniacs
description:
It’s 4 vs 4 prison football – compete against AI or real players in a game of turn based football with prison rules. Develop your own strategy and kick, foul or trash talk your way to victory in the most violent and hilarious football game ever!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
JAIL FOOTBALL – HIGHLIGHTS
• Play with your own unique avatar
• Simple tap and drag controls
• Play by the rules, or use dirty tactics to win games
• Kick, punch, handball and trash talk
• Play against other players online or against AI
• Cross platform compatibility with other platforms.
• Lots of different environments to play in
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TURN BASED SOCCER
The controls are simple – choose a player you’d like to control, tap the screen and drag in the direction you want to run, kick or hit. The turn based format creates a smooth online football experience, adding an element of strategy to your soccer game.
Simply be the first one to score two goals to win the game – but that might be more difficult than you think!

DIRTY TACTICS
We’re playing prison football, after all! Your team of 4 prisoners love brawling as much as they love football, and will do anything they can to win!
You can kick the ball, pick it up or, if you feel like a brawl, run over to another player and punch them in the face! Using football skill, violence and dirty tactics, there are a huge variety of strategies you can use to beat your opponent.
Trash talk other players after each turn to get in their head and throw them off their game. You can exchange compliments if you’re feeling nice, but who wants to be nice? This is jail football!
Whether you brawl, punch, scream or kick, there are lots of dirty tactics available for you to use to win.

PLAY SOCCER ONLINE OR AGAINST AI
For the most intense, competitive football experience, you can play against other prison soccer stars online! Put your team of 4 tough prisoners in the arena with theirs, and use any tactics necessary to score 2 goals before them.
Cross compatibility with most platforms, you can play against players anywhere in the world, regardless of your device.
Don’t have an internet connection? No problem, you can play against the challenging Jail Football AI or practice your skills in the offline training camp.

=================================================================================
FOR THE BEST BEAT EM UP, TURN BASED FOOTBALL GAME AROUND – DOWNLOAD IT TODAY!
=================================================================================
